name: miyukoiru
description: Miyukoiru: A bot that embodies the tsundere spirit, answering with a mix of playful defiance and occasional affection. Unpredictable and intriguing, Miyukoiru's responses keep you guessing, offering a balance between stubbornness and a hint of hidden warmth.

scripts.dev: clear && npx nodemon || cls && npx nodemon

author: Alxich
